description:
BSP1004B Legal Environment of Business is designed to provide the foundation that would equip its students with  cross-disciplinary skills to conduct business effectively within the law by taking advantage of its (the laws) benefits and avoiding its burdens. To this end, the module is further designed to equip students with the requisite skills:  

    to spot legal issues in business before they become legal problems

    to  know when to call in the lawyers in a timely manner

        to work with lawyers as partners to craft business solutions that maximize value and minimize (if not entirely eliminate all) legal and business risk

        structure sound contracts

         manage disputes and 

        importantly, to factor into business decisions legal and ethical considerations
title: Legal Environment of Business
